mapper.select: SELECT a.asset_idx AS assetIdx, a.asset_type AS assetType, a.bank_name AS bankName, a.asset_name AS assetName, a.asset_image AS assetImage, a.connected_status AS connectedStatus, CASE WHEN a.asset_type = 'account' THEN COALESCE(ab.balance, 0) ELSE NULL END AS accountBalance, CASE WHEN a.asset_type = 'card' THEN COALESCE(SUM(t.amount), 0) ELSE 0 END AS totalCardExpense FROM asset a LEFT JOIN account_balance ab ON a.asset_idx = ab.asset_idx LEFT JOIN transaction t ON a.asset_idx = t.asset_idx AND t.transaction_type = '출금' WHERE a.member_idx = #{memberIdx} GROUP BY a.asset_idx, a.asset_type, a.bank_name, a.asset_name, a.asset_image, a.connected_status
